title: AwbRemoteCommand
description: A remote command, that can be sent to the AWB using an AwbRemoteControl implementation

command.description: One from a set of valid remote control commands

parameter.description: Allows to specify a single string parameter for simple commands

parameterList.description: Allows to specify a number of named parameters for more complex commands

paramName.description: The parameter name, must be one from a set of known names.

paramValue.description: The parameter value, must match what is expected for this parameter
